data.title: 135 Failed Startups Founded in the USA
data.meta_description: Here's a list of 135 startups from the USA that went from millions in funding and huge teams to shut down, as well as analyses on why they failed.
data.text:
37Coins

37Coins developed a new Bitcoin platform. In 2014, they announced that providing Bitcoin transfer across different regions proved to be impossible.

Details of the startup:

Founders:

Johann Barbie, Jonathan Zobro, Songyi Lee

Country:

United States

Industry:

Finances

Started in:

2014

Closed in:

2015

NÂº of employees:

1-10

Funding Amount:

< $1M

Specific cause of failure:

Lack of Funds

37Coins

You can read more about their failure here.

Anki
